Summary: I saw a very light blue/green sphere travelling at
divs: sighting details we were on top of grady health system helipadawaiting for the aircraft to return so the lfight crew could leave. we threesaw this sphere shaped object fly over the helipad and go towards the buildingsdowntown, no noise but slight tail. a few minutes later, another object withred\white lights was observed sailing\flying along an edge of the helipad,descending towards the ground. no noise or emissions noted and no evidence of acrash etc noted. before observing these objects, we noticed in a building topfloor, a red and blue beacon flashing along with white strobes, this was neverobserved before this night. we three concurred that we saw the same objects andobserved the same about the building.
